Package com.g1.mychess.match.repository

Interface MatchRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Match,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Match,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Match,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Match,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Match,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Match>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Match,Long>
@Repository public interface MatchRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Match,Long>
Repository interface for Match entity. This interface extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations for the Match entity. It also includes custom query methods for retrieving match data based on tournament IDs and round numbers.

  • Method Details

    • findByTournamentId

      Optional<List<Match>> findByTournamentId(Long tournamentId)
      Finds matches by the specified tournament ID. This method retrieves all matches associated with a specific tournament.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament to find matches for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing a list of matches for the given tournament ID.

    • findMaxRoundNumberByTournamentId

      @Query("SELECT MAX(m.roundNumber) FROM Match m WHERE m.tournamentId = :tournamentId") Optional<Integer> findMaxRoundNumberByTournamentId(@Param("tournamentId") Long tournamentId)
      Finds the maximum round number for a given tournament. This query returns the highest round number associated with the given tournament ID.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament to find the max round number for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the maximum round number for the tournament.

    • findByTournamentIdAndRoundNumber

      Optional<List<Match>> findByTournamentIdAndRoundNumber(Long tournamentId, Integer roundNumber)
      Finds matches by both tournament ID and round number. This method retrieves all matches for a specific tournament and round.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament.
      roundNumber - The round number to find matches for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing a list of matches for the given tournament and round number.

    • findByScheduledTimeBetween

      List<Match> findByScheduledTimeBetween(LocalDateTime now, LocalDateTime oneHourLater)
